<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to disturb you at this hour.
<PAGE>
There's something I would like to discuss with
you. Would you mind coming to the guild?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. Shall we be going?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How are you liking farm life?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, good. It puts my heart at ease to hear that
you find it fulfilling. By the by...
<PAGE>
Are you satisfied with the current size of your
farm? Surely you've thought about what you
might do with some additional land, no?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It so happens that the town owns several public
fields and, in order to encourage further
productivity from everyone...
<PAGE>
We have a system in place for lending that land
to local farmers.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sure you've seen the blocked-off roads on
the mountain path, correct? Those lead to the
public fields.
<PAGE>
I recently had the roadblocks removed, so
please, feel free to inspect those fields at your
leisure.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, allow me to explain how to apply for a
lease. If you would like to rent a public field,
come speak to me at the guild counter.
<PAGE>
Next, select <BLUE>rent a field</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
At the moment, only one public field is available,
so just select that one.
<PAGE>
Go on, give it a try.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We haven't finished registering the field rental
yet. Please come speak to me at the counter.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There. Now we've finished the registration
process.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Each public field may only be rented for a
limited time. While you're renting it, you may do
anything you like with it.
<PAGE>
If you would like to continue renting it after your
lease expires, just come see me and re-register.
<PAGE>
Now, take a look at the bottom screen. The
arrow marks the location of the field you've
rented on your map.
<PAGE>
Only certain crops will grow well in any given
field, so be sure to check the signposts near
them to see which will best suit your needs.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'll also be able to rent the other public fields,
but we're still setting up a system for that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Once everything is finished, I'll call a meeting of
the town's farmers so that I can tell you all about
it.
<PAGE>
Thank you for your time.

Looks like I'm renting a new field! I should go
check it out.
